job.title: Software Engineer, Experience
job.description: stronguAbout Daily HarvestbrbrustrongDaily Harvest makes nourishing food built on fruits and vegetables accessible We do this by delivering thoughtfully sourced chefcrafted food to customers doorsteps all ready to enjoy in minutes Were on a mission to take care of food so food can take care of youbrbrOur team is collaborative driven and futurethinking Were constantly learning experimenting and iterating and celebrate failure just as much as success We take risks try new things and we get things done We love adaptogens and cruciferous vegetables but never say no to cake Everything we do we do in the service of our communitybrbrstronguPosition OverviewbrbrustrongDaily Harvest is looking for a Software Engineer to join the Engineering team The Engineering team focuses on architecting developing and delivering highly scalable and innovative software that meets the needs of the Daily Harvest business and our customersbrbrAs a member of our software engineering team youll be part of a team that crafts and ships the code that powers our entire business and enables us to take care of food  from userfacing web experiences to code that interfaces with our RESTful API services Youll be joining a team of inspired engineers who enjoy working togetherbrbrstrongWhat youll dobrstrongul liDesign estimate and implement new and refactored software services on the platform securely reliably and at scaleli liWork crossfunctionally with product and engineering to contribute to the technical design of projects with major company impactli liWork with internal tech teams to help to identify and build platform elements required to support key product featuresli liEffectively communicate and collaborate with product owners and other members of the digital product team to develop bestofbreed digital experience that meet the needs of our users and drive our business objectivesli liIdentify and execute on opportunities to improve the software development lifecycle and processesli brulstrongWho you are brstrongul liEducation training or experience equivalent to a BS or higher eg MS or PhD in Computer Science or a related technical field involving coding eg physics or mathematicsli li2 years of professional experience with software developmentli liExperience with JavaScript ES6 CSS amp HTMLli liExperience delivering production applications using a modern JavaScript framework such as AngularJS or Reactli liExperience with several of the following Redux ReduxSaga TypeScript Bootstrap SASS Storybook Jest ESLint Prettier webpack React Nativeli liExperience with Agile software development and Agile software solutions like JIRA and Clubhouseli liExperience in automated testing a plusli liExperience with Python a plusli liContinuous integration and continuous delivery experience preferredli liExperience buildingleveraging RESTful APIs and services at scale preferredli brulstrongBenefitsbrstrongul liUnlimited Daily Harvest in the office to keep you hustling not hangry  cold brew always stockedli liFlexible timeoff policy  flexible working hours Unlimited PTO Planli liCompetitive medical dental and vision benefits 401K  equity participation li liAncillary benefits Commuter Gym membership  Citi Bike discountsli liAccess to everything we make including recipes in developmentli liAnnual company retreatli liQuarterly team outings weekly onsite happy hours  regular DH team gatherings to celebrate our coworkersli liBook club  running clubli liShowers for postmorning or midworkday workoutsli liA dynamic ambitious and fun work environment  dog friendlyli brbrulemAt Daily Harvest our mission is to take care of food so that food can take care of you And it wouldnt be possible without our team We celebrate the unique POV that each person brings to the table and believe in a collaborative and inclusive environment As an equal opportunity employer we prohibit any unlawful discrimination on the basis of race color religion military or veteran status sex gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin age disability or genetic information These are our guiding principles and apply across all aspects of employmentbrbremPosition SummarybrbrstrongWhat youll dobrbrstrongstrongWho you arebrbrstrongstrongBenefitsbrstrongul liUnlimited Daily Harvest in the office to keep you hustling not hangry  cold brew always stockedli liFlexible timeoff policy  flexible working hours Unlimited PTO Planli liCompetitive medical dental and vision benefits 401K  equity participation li liAncillary benefits Commuter Gym membership  Citi Bike discountsli liAccess to everything we make including recipes in developmentli liAnnual company retreatli liQuarterly team outings weekly onsite happy hours  regular DH team gatherings to celebrate our coworkersli liBook club  running clubli liShowers for postmorning or midworkday workoutsli liA dynamic ambitious and fun work environment  dog friendlyli
